Name: Quila-Crest
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Cyndaquil, Quilava, and Typhlosion.  Swap a Quila-Hair and a Quila-Card for a Quila-Crest at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
